alert.note: Alert for Custer (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:52PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Custer County through 115 PM MDT... At 1252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Volborg, or 25 miles southeast of Miles City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mizpah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
